subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Angelo Zomegnan, the race director of the legendary Giro d’Italia cycling race, is the driving force behind bringing the first two stages of the Giro to the streets of Washington in 2012.
snippet: Angelo Zomegnan, the race director of the legendary Giro d’Italia cycling race, is the driving force behind bringing the first two stages of the Giro to the streets of Washington in 2012.
